property.name: dfs.name.dir
property.value: {% for data_dir_parent in hadoop_hdfs['dfs_dir_parent'] %}{% if not loop.first and flag == 1 %},{% else %}{% set flag=1 %}{% endif %}file://{{data_dir_parent}}{{hadoop_hdfs['dfs_dir_namenode']}}{% endfor %}

property.name: dfs.datanode.data.dir
property.value: {% for data_dir in hadoop_hdfs['dfs_dir_datanode'] %}{% if not loop.first and flag == 1 %},{% else %}{% set flag=1 %}{% endif %}file://{{data_dir}}{% endfor %}

property.name: dfs.namenode.secondary.http-address
property.value: {% for server in groups['SNN'] %}{% if not loop.first and flag == 1 %},{% else %}{% set flag=1 %}{% endif %}{{server}}{% endfor %}:50090

property.name: dfs.namenode.checkpoint.dir
property.value: {% for data_dir in hadoop_hdfs['dfs_dir_parent'] %}{% if not loop.first and flag == 1 %},{% else %}{% set flag=1 %}{% endif %}file://{{data_dir}}{{hadoop_hdfs['dfs_dir_sec_namenode']}}{% endfor %}:50090

property.name: dfs.namenode.plugins
property.description: Comma-separated list of namenode plug-ins to be activated.

property.name: dfs.datanode.plugins
property.description: Comma-separated list of datanode plug-ins to be activated.
